page.title: 06BEAFORD;A BOY'S SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday morning I woke up at 7 a.m. and went to help Dad with the milking. When we had finished we went indoors to a breakfast of bacon, eggs and potato. Afterwards we injected some sheep with Panacur to prevent worms. It was 12 noon when I returned home. I listened to Dave Lee Travis on the radio. After dinner I went down to the stream and built a small dam. It was quite easy to build because there were some rocks on the bank. Later I fed the bullocks some straw. At 9 p.m. that evening one of our cows calved. As I went indoors, the television programme I was looking forward to seeing had begun. It was a boxing match between Eusebio Pedrosa and Barry McGuigan, which Barry won. I had an enjoyable Saturday.
